General.Name: Cansortium Inc
General.Description: Cansortium Inc., through its subsidiaries, produces and sells medical cannabis in Florida, Pennsylvania, and Texas. The company's medical cannabis products are offered in oral drops, capsules, topicals, syringes, dried flower, pre-rolls, cartridges, and edibles under the Fluent brand name. It also sells various third-party branded medical cannabis products. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Miami, Florida.
General.Address: 82 North East 26th Street, Miami, FL, United States, 33137
